GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
ASoC: da7219: Fix an error handling path in da7219_register_dai_clks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 4993c1511d66326f1037bc5156b024a6a96d23ef, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 78013a1cf2971684775f6956d5666237ac53a1aa. For more details please see the references link.
